attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Dear Prime Minister
Re: Human fertilisation and Embriological Bill.

We understand that there is three-line whip on this bill. We do feel that Members of Parliament should be allowed to vote according to conscience and We would respectfully ask you to withdraw the whip on this important bill.
 If we are not correct in our understanding we do apologise
Yours sincerely
Peter Madden

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
